Blueberries.NAME: Blueberries
Blueberries.FLAVOR: A mysterious berries left by the forgotten one.

Runesmith:BrokenRuby.NAME: Broken Ruby
Runesmith:BrokenRuby.FLAVOR: A crystal that resembles a red gem. Although it is broken, faint energy still remains.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, Gain #b1 #yIgnis. Gain #b1 #yIgnis for every three attacks played.

Runesmith:MiniCore.NAME: Minicore
Runesmith:MiniCore.FLAVOR: This peculiar orb was once used as an energy storage.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yPotency at the start of the combat.

Runesmith:Nanobots.NAME: Nanobots
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, #yEnhance all cards in your hand.

Runesmith:UraniumAnvil.NAME: Uranium Anvil
Runesmith:UraniumAnvil.FLAVOR: This block of metal holds massive amount of energy but weakens anyone who come near it.
DESCRIPTIONS: at the start of your turn. #yDowngrade a random card in your deck each turn.

Runesmith:Locket.NAME: Locket
Runesmith:Locket.FLAVOR: An image of unknown yet familiar figure resides within.
DESCRIPTIONS: One time each combat, if your health drops below 15%, add Last Stand to the top of your draw pile.

Runesmith:AutoHammer.NAME: AutoHammer
Runesmith:AutoHammer.FLAVOR: An automatic hammer which never stops hammering.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 skills in #b1 turn, #yEnhance a random card in your hand.

Runesmith:EmergencyProvisions.NAME: Emergency Provisions
Runesmith:EmergencyProvisions.FLAVOR: A self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play a Craft card, gain #b1 random Element.
